QuestData.Title: To Breach a Fire Wall
QuestData.Description:
The rebels inside the cavern have been imbued with an elemental blessing, allowing them to safely pass through the wall of flame. I can grant you that same boon.
Do not worry; I have seen the blessing granted many times. It shouldn't be any problem to recreate it effectively.
QuestData.RewardText: Worry not. That chilly, damp feeling is temporary.
